thread.section_title: Mobile-Mate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mobile-Mate | mobile-mate.com.au | 2 of 242
thread.title: Liz Blake

author: Liz Blake
title: Liz Blake
text:
Definitely worth buying a genuine Samsung battery for my Note4. Delivery arrived quickly and battery works great!
I could not get a genuine Samsung at first so tried 2 generic batteries from another supplier, supposedly for the Note4. The generics were hopeless, and worse, that company's service non existent till I said I was about to write a review... I am still waiting for a response and my rightful refund. I'm sticking with genuine brand and happy with this supplier.
